property.label: name
property.description: Name of the item.

property.label: description
property.description: Short description of the item.

property.label: image
property.description: URL of an image of the item.

property.label: link
property.description: URL of the item.

property.label: hasAuthorityLink
property.description: A authoritative link to a MARCR authority record.

class.label: Creative Work
class.tagline: The most generic kind of creative work, including bibliographic resources, movies, photographs, software programs, etc.

property.label: mainEntry
property.description: The primary entity associated with the creative work. Refinement relationships will be defined as subproperties of this property.

property.label: addedEntry
property.description: The additinoal entities associated with the creative work. Refinement relationships will be defined as subproperties of this parent.

property.label: uniformTitle
property.description: Uniform title printed or displayed

property.label: audience
property.description: Intended audience of the instance.

property.label: note
property.description: Note that provides general information regarding the work.

property.label: subject
property.description: Subject associated with the Bibliographic Resource.

property.label: hasInstance
property.typedesc: @PhysicalBook or @PhysicalMap or @ComputerFile or @PhysicalMusic or @Application or @Audio or @Image or @Video or @Text
property.description: An instantiation of a creative work.

property.label: relatedTo
property.description: A related Creative Work. Refinement relationships will be defined as subproperties of this property.

class.label: Collection
class.tagline: A collection of Creative Works. Examples of collections include continuing resources, journal serials, etc.

property.label: seriesStatement
property.description: Series statement for a series title.

property.label: hasWork
property.description: A creative work.

property.label: abstract
property.description: Text of the abstract

property.label: formatedContentsNote
property.description: Formated content notes including table of contents, etc.

property.label: summary
property.description: Text of the summary, abstract or review.

property.label: note
property.description: summary

property.label: note
property.description: summary

property.label: note
property.description: summary
summary

property.description: summary

property.description: summary

class.label: Collection
class.tagline: A collection of Creative Works. Examples of collections include continuing resources, journal serials, etc.

property.label: seriesStatement
property.description: Series statement for a series title.

property.label: hasWork
property.description: A creative work.

property.label: title
property.description: Title added entry

property.label: language
property.description: Language associated with the instance.

property.label: edition
property.description: Edition of a creative work

property.label: note
property.description: Note that provides specific information regarding the instance.

property.label: publisher
property.description: Entity responsible for publishing the Resource.

property.label: publishedAt
property.description: Place of publication.

property.label: publishedOn
property.description: Date(s) associated with the publication of the Resource.

property.label: extent
property.description: Total playing time, etc. of each type of item.

property.label: format
property.description: The format of the application

property.label: systemDetails
property.description: Technical information about an item, such as the presence or absence of certain kinds of codes; or the physical characteristics of a computer file, such as recording densities, parity, blocking factors, mode of access, software programming language, computer requirements, peripheral requirements, trade name or recording systems, number of lines of resolution, and modulation frequency.

property.label: format
property.description: The format of the application

property.label: extent
property.description: Total playing time, etc. of each type of item.

property.label: format
property.description: The format of the video

property.label: format
property.description: The format of the video

property.label: format
property.description: The format of the video

property.label: resolution
property.description: The resolution of the images

property.label: dpi
property.description: The spatial resolution (DPI) of the image

property.label: pixelHeight
property.description: The pixel height of the image

property.label: pixelWidth
property.description: The pixel width of the image

property.label: ISBN
property.description: ISBN of the item.

property.label: extent
property.description: Number of physical pages, volumes, cassettes, total playing time, etc. of each type of item.

property.label: otherPhysicalDetails
property.description: Physical characteristics such as illustrative matter, coloration, playing speed, groove characteristics, etc.

property.label: dimensions
property.description: Expressed in centimeters, millimeters or inches

class.label: Physical Music
class.tagline: Physical Music such as records, CDs, cassettes, etc.

property.label: extent
property.description: Number of physical pages, volumes, cassettes, total playing time, etc. of each type of item.

property.label: otherPhysicalDetails
property.description: Physical characteristics such as playing speed, groove characteristics, etc.

property.label: systemDetails
property.description: Technical information about an item, such as the presence or absence of certain kinds of codes; or the physical characteristics of a computer file, such as recording densities, parity, blocking factors, mode of access, software programming language, computer requirements, peripheral requirements, trade name or recording systems, number of lines of resolution, and modulation frequency.

class.label: Physical Map
class.tagline: A physical cartographic resource such as a paper map, globe, etc.

property.label: scale
property.description: Scale of cartographic content.

property.label: projection
property.description: Projection of cartographic content

property.label: latLong
property.description: Longitude and latitude of cartographic content.

property.label: hasIDLink
property.description: A authoritative link to a id.loc.gov record.

property.label: hasViafLink
property.description: A authoritative link to a VIAF authority record.

property.description: A authoritative link to a id.loc.gov record.
